name: browser-search-regeggs
description:
Adding functionality to the ctrl+f search function of google Chrome
Additional functionalities:
  1. regular expression search
  2. multiple searches at once
  3. ability to change highlight colors
  4. ability to drag search bar across a given html page
  5. copy selection to clipboard
Not deployed yet
Want to test out the current state?
Directions:
  1. clone the repository locally
  2. navigate to chrome://extensions/
  3. turn developer mode on in the top right hand corner
  4. click load unpacked
  5. select the directory you cloned into
  6. might have to restart chrome, the keyboard shortcuts can be finiky on the first go
  7. on any given webpage use the shortcut CTRL+SHIFT+F to bring up the search bar
